properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 11:12AM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* from Tuesday, January 7, until Friday, January 10.
* At 10 AM Friday the stage was...22.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 28.5 feet on Wednesday, January 8.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday, January 7, with a
crest near 28.5 feet on Wednesday, January 8. The river is
forecast to fall below flood stage by Friday, January 10.
At 29.0 feet, In Arkansas, water is going over the north side of
Craighead Point. Pumphouse area for the power plant south of Osceola
is flooded. In Tennessee, Lauderdale County Road 924 begins to flood,
isolating a house on Island 34.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
